|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43217; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad2n = 300 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4 |rad2correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad2cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Part Number: CGA4131'''COM''' ([https://fccid.io/VUICGA4131/Label/Label-3429483 ''CBR-T'']) - {{Approved by service|Comcast}} ''Xfinity'' {{see also|Technicolor CGM4140COM|Technicolor TC4400}} * DOCSIS 3.1 dual 192Mhz downstream OFDM plus 32 SC-QAM channels * DOCSIS 3.1 dual 96Mhz upstream OFDM plus 8 SC-WAM channels
<!-- {{FCC ST|12/16/2017|indexme.}} -->
*{{WiFiCert|WFA73470|09/11/2017}} :Product: CGA4131-P15-13-A000-c2100r1712 - CGA4131TCH :Wi-Fi Component: BCM4366 (v10.10.122.303), BCM43217 :Product. Technicolor. Company. September 11, 2017. :2.4 GHz, 5 GHz - Concurrent. :2 Spatial Streams 2.4 GHz. 4 Spatial Streams 5 GHz. :Short Guard Interval. Greenfield Preamble. TX A-MPDU. STBC Transmit.
'''Note:''' A note in the Test Report NII document at the FCC says, :"2.4GHz and 5GHz technology cannot transmit at same time". This may refer to the BCM4366 radio instead of the device as a whole.
:TCH CGA4131 CBR LION BATTERY PACK, HS CODE: 850760
==Links of Interest== *[http://www.multichannel.com/news/cable-operators/cablelabs-stamps-another-batch-docsis-31-devices/416661 On '''MultiChannel''']
==See also== *[[technicolor CGM423x]] • [http://www.technicolor.com/en/solutions-services/connected-home/broadband-devices/cable-modems-gateways/cgm423x PPage] :2x2 OFDM(A) bonded channels in DOCSIS 3.1 mode :32x8 bonded channels in DOCSIS 3.0 mode :Dual-band concurrent 802.11n 2.4GHz (3x3) ::and 802.11ac 5GHz (4x4) Wi-Fi interfaces :MoCA 2.0 interface (optional) :1.2GHz full band capture tuner :4x Gigabit Ethernet LAN ports
{{lowercase}} [[Category:English Documentation]]
